title.rendered: COMING SOON! D’LASHES FACIALS WITH NEW THE ZENA FOSTER FACE MASSAGERS

content.rendered:
COMING SOON! D’LASHES FACIALS WITH NEW THE ZENA FOSTER FACE MASSAGERS

D’Lashes is excited to announce that we will soon be offering luxury facials with the help of these innovative facial massagers from Zena Foster’s new line. Our goal is to help your skin glow from the inside out while helping diminish signs of aging, stress, and fatigue. More info to come soon! To book your facials appointments in advance as well as your lash extensions appointment CLICK HERE.

 Zena Foster High Roller Face and Body Massager – www.zenafoster.com

The High Roller will leave your skin feeling energized and enhanced. CLICK HERE TO SHOP.

Benefits

  • Regular usage of the High Roller on the face and body and helps improve the appearance of skin tone for a more refreshed, healthy and youthful-looking appearance.
  • Rejuvenates facial skin.
  • Helps diminish signs of aging (lines and wrinkles).

Suggested Use

  • Best for face, neck, and hands, but can be used all over your body.
  • Recommended massaging each desired area for up to 30-45 seconds in up and down or left and right motions.
  • Daily use encouraged.

Zena Foster Sonic Gold Beauty Bar

As the vibrating T-shaped bar glides over the skin, it stimulates the tiny blood vessels just under the surface. That helps relieve tension in the area and boost circulation, bringing a rush of skin-boosting nutrients to the area. CLICK HERE TO SHOP.

Benefits

  • Rejuvenates facial skin
  • Helps diminish signs of aging (lines and wrinkles)
  • Safe for use around the eye area

BOOK THOSE D’LASHES APPOINTMENTS EARLY! THEY WILL FILL UP FAST.

LOVE DIONNE
